lead_paragraph: In 2017, we'll roam even more widely and dig even more deeply into the issues, both those that animate and those that infuriate Americans. We’ll be looking to continue our innovative approach to journalism, pouring resources into big stories and keeping our readers foremost in our minds. And we’re looking to add to our staff with even journalists deeply committed to covering the country.

headline.main: Change is coming to The New York Times National Desk
